response_requirements.initial_response_description: Agency must respond within 5 business days informing requester whether request is granted or denied
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If request granted, agency must fulfill request within 30 days from date of response unless scope requires extension
response_requirements.extension_notes: Extension available if total scope of request prevents fulfillment within 30 days; must notify requester of extension
response_requirements.deemed_denial: If agency fails to respond within 5 business days, request is deemed denied

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Agencies may not charge for staff time to search for or retrieve records
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Duplication fees as established by Office of Open Records regulations; varies by format
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Enhanced electronic access fees for special programming or conversion
fee_structure.fee_waiver_criteria: If requester demonstrates inability to pay or waiver is in public interest

exemptions.description: Records that constitute or reveal trade secrets or confidential proprietary information
Employment history, salary, disciplinary records, social security numbers, personal contact information of agency employees
Records relating to or resulting in criminal investigation, including complaints of potential criminal conduct
Predecisional deliberations including recommendations, advice, counsel, and consultative materials
Records protected by attorney-client privilege, attorney work product, or judicial privilege
Medical records or psychological reports of individuals
Records identifying name, home address, or date of birth of child 17 years or younger
Financial records of agency employees, appointees, officials, or consultants

appeal_process.first_level_notes: Appeal must be filed within 15 business days of mailing date of denial notice or deemed denial
appeal_process.second_level_notes: Appeals officer issues determination within 30 days unless extension necessary; requester or agency may file petition for review with court within 30 days of final determination
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court may award reasonable attorney fees and costs if requester substantially prevails

requester_requirements.identification_notes: Written request must include name and address of requester
requester_requirements.purpose_notes: Agency may not require explanation of why records are requested
requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Written request required to agency's open-records officer; must identify or describe records and specify preferred medium
requester_requirements.specific_format: Request must include: (a) identification/description of records, (b) preferred medium, (c) name and address of requester

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Each agency must designate an open-records officer responsible for ensuring compliance
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Requester may specify preferred medium for access
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Act must be construed to maximize access and minimize denials, with presumption that records are accessible

oversight_body.name: Office of Open Records
oversight_body.role: Reviews denials, issues final determinations, provides training, issues advisory opinions, and promulgates regulations
oversight_body.contact_info: Office of Open Records, Commonwealth Keystone Building, 400 North Street, 4th Floor, Harrisburg, PA 17120

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from official Pennsylvania statute. Initial response required within 5 business days (grant or deny). If request granted, must fulfill within 30 calendar days unless scope requires extension. Appeal to Office of Open Records within 15 business days of denial; appeals officer issues determination within 30 days. Further review available in Court of Common Pleas within 30 days. Deemed denial if agency fails to respond within 5 business days. Fee waivers available if inability to pay or public interest. Act construed to maximize access with presumption records are accessible.
